attributes.action: Make everyone that has claimed unemployment benefit for longer than 8 months work for it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every one that is claiming unemploymnt benefit for longer than 8 months should be made to work as road sweepers or community helpers to continue claiming. Thier claims can be worked out into an hourly rate for the week, if they work they recieve if they don't then no payment.
